title: Bamboozler 14 Mk II
paragraphs: The Bamboozler 14 Mk II is a main weapon in the Splatoon series. It is a Bamboozler 14 Mk I with the Cuttlegear logo plastered onto it and a different loadout.

The Bamboozler 14 Mk II is nearly identical to the Bamboozler 14 Mk I. The only difference between the two is that the Bamboozler 14 Mk II has a sticker bearing the Cuttlegear logo on the back of the barrel.
In Splatoon 3, the Bamboozler 14 Mk II features a cooler green for the color of the bamboo.
The Bamboozler 14 Mk II was released on 18 November 2015 at 02:00 UTC.[1] It comes in a set with Disruptors and the Echolocator.
- Promotional image.
- An Inkling aiming with the Bamboozler 14 Mk II equipped.
- Firing the Bamboozler 14 Mk II on Saltspray Rig. (front)
- Firing the Bamboozler 14 Mk II from up high on Saltspray Rig. (back)
- An Inkling girl holding the Bamboozler 14 Mk II.
- Official art of an Inkling holding the Bamboozler 14 Mk II.
- SplatNet icon
The Bamboozler 14 Mk II was released on 1 July 2018 at 00:00 UTC.[3] It comes with Toxic Mist and the Burst-Bomb Launcher.
- Promotional image
- An official teaser image

The Bamboozler 14 Mk II returns in Splatoon 3 as part of Sizzle Season 2024. Its kit consists of Fizzy Bomb and Super Chump. Its design has changed somewhat from past games; the bamboo color is now a much darker, deeper, cooler variant of green, rather than the traditional lighter green of the Mk I. Otherwise, the design remains unchanged, with a Cuttlegear logo on the side of the weapon.

Model of the Bamboozler 14 Mk II rotating (link to file)
- With a full set of Damage Up, this weapon can reach 99.99 damage with less than a full charge. Since the range is the same no matter the charge, this can prove useful.
